Summary: Numerous UFO's conducting fast eradict maneuvers
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsMy father called telling me to rush to my uncles because they were staring at a UFO. I rush over and couldn't believe my eyes. There were two UFO's "playing" with each other. They were moving at high speeds and suddenly stop and hover. They were doing circles at high speeds. Nothing no military aircraft can do. I called others who confirmed what I saw. It changed to either a solid red or a solid green ball of light. One went east in a high speed and the other disappeared west in a eradic fashion.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Torrance
There were no other sightings in Torrance on or around May 4th 2009
